                                <script type="text/javascript">
                                    jQuery(document).ready(function () {
                                        jQuery('.menu_noter').each(function (index, element) {
                                            jQuery.la.voting.voteover(jQuery(element).attr('data-vote-average'), element);
                                            jQuery(element).find('.etoileLink').click(function () {
                                                var voteValue = jQuery(this).attr('data-vote-value');
                                                jQuery.la.voting.setVote(jQuery(element).attr('data-vote-id'), voteValue, element);
                                            });

                                            jQuery(element).find('.etoileLink').bind('mouseout', function () {
                                                jQuery.la.voting.voteover(jQuery(element).attr('data-vote-average'), element);
                                            });

                                            jQuery(element).find('.etoileLink').bind('mouseover', function () {
                                                jQuery.la.voting.voteover(jQuery(this).attr('data-vote-value'), element);
                                            });
                                        });
                                    });
                                </script>

                            <p class="copyright">
                                <span>Tous publics (mention rating CSA)</span>
                                <span class="copy">&copy;</span> : Oggy et les cafards . Tous droits réservés.
                            </p>
                            <ul class="informations clearfix">
                                <li class="duration">
                                    Durée
                                    <span>07m 50s</span>
                                </li>
                                <li class="next-broadcast">
                                    Prochaine diffusion <span>mercredi 22 août 2018 à 14h00</span>
                                </li>
                                <li class="more-than">
                                    Plus que
                                    <span id="decompte_VOD68993752052000" data-end="1536105540"></span>
                                    pour regarder ce programme !
                                </li>
                            </ul>
                            <p class="description">Plus beau et coloré que jamais, Oggy revient dans de nouvelles aventures
                                racontant son voyage à travers les siècles avec toujours beaucoup d&#039;humour et de bonne
                                humeur. Si les enfants l&#039;attendent avec impatience, leurs parents aussi ! Pendant 4
                                saisons, soit presque 20 ans et 300 épisodes, Oggy n&#039;a cessé de lutter contre Joey,
                                Dee-Dee et Marky, qui lui livrent un combat incessant et sans pitié. Et ce n&#039;est pas
                                prêt de s&#039;arrêter ! Grâce à une production en Ultra HD, les équipes de Xilam ont réussi
                                le pari de renouveler cette série indémodable avec une qualité inégalable et des couleurs
                                éclatantes. Pour cette 5e saison, Oggy réserve à ses fans une expérience visuelle exceptionnelle.
                                De l&#039;ère préhistorique à la mythologie grecque en passant par les années folles et l&#039;an
                                3000, les téléspectateurs plongeront dans l&#039;Histoire, à la rencontre de personnages
                                légendaires tels que César, Léonard de Vinci, le Cyclope ou encore Napoléon. Une façon d&#039;aider
                                les enfants à se familiariser avec l&#039;Histoire, tout en s&#039;amusant.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                            <span class="nb_episodes"></span>

                <script type="text/javascript">
                    jQuery(document).ready(function () {
                        jQuery("[id^='decompte_']").each(function () {
                            jQuery.la.video.compteRebours($(this).attr('id').replace('decompte_', ''));
                        });

                        jQuery.ajax({
                            type: "GET",
                            url: "/replay/smil/VOD68993752052000",
                            dataType: "json",
                            success: function (oRes) {
                                if (oRes.filename) {
                                    jQuery('#flashcontent').html('<div class="lajwpl" style="position:relative;">                        <img style="display:block;width:100%;height:auto;" src="http://resize1-gulli.ladmedia.fr/rcrop/748,420/img/var/storage/imports/replay/images_programme/oggy_et_les_cafards_s5.jpg" />                        <div class="lazyplayercontainer" style="overflow:visible;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;">                            <iframe id="jwpiframe" scrolling="no" seamless="seamless" class="lazyplayer" onload="onPlayerLoaded(this);"  frameborder="0" allowfullscreen scrolling="no" data-src="loaded" src="http://replay.gulli.fr/jwplayer/embed/VOD68993752052000" allowfullscreen="true" frameborder="0" style="width:100%;height:100%;"></iframe>                        </div>                    </div>                    <style type="text/css">                                    .closebtttn {                        top:-35px !important;                        z-index: 9;                    }                    .icon-x:before {                        content: "\\f081";                        font-family:Gulli_pictos;                        text-shadow: 0px 0px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 1);                    }                    @font-face {                        font-family: "Gulli_pictos";                        src: url("/bundles/jeunesseintegrationgulli/fonts/Gulli_pictos.eot?wsxysj");                        src: url("/bundles/jeunesseintegrationgulli/fonts/Gulli_pictos.eot?wsxysj#iefix") format("embedded-opentype"), url("/bundles/jeunesseintegrationgulli/fonts/Gulli_pictos.ttf?wsxysj") format("truetype"), url("/bundles/jeunesseintegrationgulli/fonts/Gulli_pictos.woff?wsxysj") format("woff"), url("/bundles/jeunesseintegrationgulli/fonts/Gulli_pictos.svg?wsxysj#Gulli_pictos") format("svg");                        font-weight: normal;                        font-style: normal                    }                    [class^="icon-"],[class*=" icon-"] {                        font-family: "Gulli_pictos" !important;                        speak: none;                        font-style: normal;                        font-weight: normal;                        font-variant: normal;                        text-transform: none;                        line-height: 1;                        letter-spacing: 0;                        -webkit-font-feature-settings: "liga";                        -moz-font-feature-settings: "liga=1";                        -moz-font-feature-settings: "liga";                        -ms-font-feature-settings: "liga" 1;                        font-feature-settings: "liga";                        -webkit-font-variant-ligatures: discretionary-ligatures;                        font-variant-ligatures: discretionary-ligatures;                        -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;                        -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale                    }                                            @keyframes opa {                            0%   {opacity: 0; transform: translate3d(0px,-50vh,0); }                            100% {opacity: 1; }                        }                        .jwplfloat{                            position:fixed !important;                            bottom:20px !important;                            right:0px !important;                            left:auto !important;                            top:auto !important;                            box-shadow: 0px 0px 25px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.75);                            z-index:999999999 !important;                            width:350px !important;                            height:210px !important;                            animation-name: opa;                            animation-duration: 0.3s;                            animation-fill-mode: forwards;                        }                        @media (max-width: 665px) {                          .jwplfloat{                                    width:300px !important;                                    height:180px !important;                                }                        }                        @media (orientation: landscape) {                        @media (max-width: 400px) and (orientation: portrait) {                          .jwplfloat{                                    width:170px !important;                                    height:96px !important;                        }                        .lazyplayercontainer{                            width:100%;                            height:100%;                            position:absolute;                            top:0;                            bottom:auto;                            right:auto;                            z-index:0;                        }                    </style>                    <s' + 'cript type="text/javascript">                        document.playerloaded = true;                        document.playerstate = "notfloating";                        document.playerViewState = true;                        document.playerClicked = false;                        var lazyIframe = {                            query:function(rule){                                return document.querySelectorAll(rule);                            },                            isInView:function(domElt){                                var coords = domElt.getBoundingClientRect();                                return (coords.top < window.innerHeight/2);                            },                            isOutView:function(domElt){                                var coords = domElt.parentNode.children[0].getBoundingClientRect();                                if( ( coords.height + coords.top - 40 ) < 0 )return true;                                if( coords.top > (window.innerHeight - 40 )) return true;                                return false;                            },                            floatingthumb:function(domElt){                                if(  document.playerstate == "notfloating" && document.playerloaded && document.playerClicked) {                                    document.playerstate = "floating";                                    $(domElt ).addClass("jwplfloat");                                          $(domElt).prepend("<div class=\\"closebtttn\\" style=\\"position:absolute;cursor:pointer;top:10px;right:10px;\\" ><button style=\\"opacity:1;color:#FFF;font-size:34px;\\" type=\\"button\\" class=\\"icon-x close\\"></button></div> ");                                          $(domElt).find(".closebtttn, .closebtttn button").bind("click", function(){ lazyIframe.unfloatingthumb(domElt);  document.playerstate = "locked"; })                                }                            },                            unfloatingthumb:function(domElt){                             if(  document.playerstate == "floating" && document.playerloaded && document.playerClicked) {                                    document.playerstate = "notfloating";                                   $(domElt).removeClass("jwplfloat");                                   $(".closebtttn").remove();                                }                            },                            load:function(domElt){                                var src = domElt.getAttribute("data-src");                                if(src != "loaded"){                                    domElt.setAttribute("src", src);                                    domElt.setAttribute("data-src", "loaded");                                    document.playerloaded = true;                                }                            },                            run:function(){                                lazyIframes = lazyIframe.query(".lazyplayer");                                for (var k = 0; k < lazyIframes.length; k++){                                    if( lazyIframe.isInView(lazyIframes[k])) {                                        lazyIframe.load( lazyIframes[k] );                                    }                                }                                if( typeof(window.matchMedia) === "function" ){                                   /*if (window.matchMedia("(min-width: 800px)").matches) {*/ if(true){                                        floatingFrames = lazyIframe.query(".lazyplayercontainer");                                        for (var k = 0; k < floatingFrames.length; k++){                                            if(k < 1){                                                currentViewState =  lazyIframe.isOutView(floatingFrames[k]);                                                if(currentViewState != document.playerViewState ){                                                    document.playerViewState = currentViewState;                                                    if( currentViewState ) {                                                        console.log("outview:floating");                                                        lazyIframe.floatingthumb( floatingFrames[k] );                                                    }else{                                                        console.log("intview:unfloating");                                                        lazyIframe.unfloatingthumb( floatingFrames[k] );                                                    }                                                }                                            }                                        }                                    }                                }                            },                            attachEvent:function(){                                document.addEventListener("scroll", lazyIframe.run);                               window.addEventListener( "message",                                  function (e) {                                        if(e.data == "jwplClicked" ){                                            document.playerClicked = true;                                        }                                  });                            },                        };                        lazyIframe.attachEvent();                    </s' + 'cript>                    ');
                                } else {
                                    /* display geoblocking message */
                                }
                            }
                        });
                        jQuery.la.bookmark.toggleBoutonsFavori();

                        jQuery('#openShareModal').click(function () {
                            var queryStringModal = '?url=' + window.location.href + '&name=Oggy%20et%20les%20cafards%20-%20Saison%205%2C%20Episode%2045%20%3A%20Mon%20empire%20pour%20une%20peluche';
                            jQuery('#modalContent').load('/Activites/share/video' + queryStringModal + ' #envoiAmi', function () {
                                function extractUrlParams(string) {
                                    var t = string.substring(1).split('&');
                                    var f = [];
                                    for (var i = 0; i < t.length; i++) {
                                        var x = t[i].split('=');
                                        f[x[0]] = x[1];
                                    }
                                    return f;
                                }

                                var aParam = extractUrlParams(queryStringModal);
                                if ('name' in aParam) {
                                    jQuery('#share_contentName').val(aParam.name);
                                }
                                if ('url' in aParam) {
                                    jQuery('#share_contentUrl').val(aParam.url);
                                }

                                // post le formulaire
                                jQuery('#shareForm').on('submit', function (event) {
                                    event.preventDefault();
                                });
                                jQuery('#myShareButton').click(function () {
                                    jQuery.ajax({
                                        url: '/Activites/share/video',
                                        type: 'POST',
                                        data: $('#shareForm').serialize(),
                                        success: function () {
                                            jQuery('#envoiAmi').load('/Activites/share/success #mySuccess');
                                        }
                                    });
                                });
                            });
                        });
                    });

                    // Height de la vidéo ajouté à la playlist
                    $(document).ready(function fnHeightVideo() {
                        var w = window.innerWidth;
                        if (w > 992) {
                            var Hvideo = $('.player_video_replay iframe').height();
                            var newHvideo = parseInt(Hvideo) - 70;

                            $('.ListItems').height(newHvideo - 1);
                            $('.buttons .bottom').css("top", newHvideo + 105);

                            $(window).bind('resize', function () {
                                $('.ListItems').height(newHvideo - 1);
                                $('.buttons .bottom').css("top", newHvideo + 105);
                            });
                            setTimeout(fnHeightVideo, 200);
                        }
                    });

                    function onPlayerLoaded(elt) {
                        playlist = elt.contentWindow.getPlayList();
                        var list = document.getElementById("list");
                        var html = list.innerHTML;
                        var liclass = '';
                        var playlistLen = playlist.length;

                        for (var index = 0; index < playlistLen; index++) {
                            if (elt.contentWindow.getPlaylistIndex() == index) {
                                liclass = ' current';
                            } else {
                                liclass = '';
                            }
                            html += "<div class='element" + liclass + "'>"
                                + "<span title='" + playlist[index].title + "'>"
                                + "<a href='javascript:playThis(" + index + ");'>"
                                + "<span class='wrap-img'>"
                                + "<img height='120' width='160' src='" + playlist[index].image + "'/>"
                                + "</span>"
                                + "<span class='title'>" + playlist[index].titleHTML + "</span>"
                                + "</a>"
                                + "</span>"
                                + "</div>";
                            list.innerHTML = html;
                        }

                        // display nombre de vidéos
                        $('.nb_episodes:first').html(jQuery('#list .element').length + ' épisodes');

                        setTimeout(function () {
                            new AutoScroll().init(elt.contentWindow.getPlaylistIndex())
                        }, 1000);
                    }

                    function playThis(index) {
                        // joue la playlist
                        document.getElementById('jwpiframe').contentWindow.playlistItem(index);
                        changePlayListIndex(index);
                    }

                    function changePlayListIndex(index) {
                        var list = document.getElementById("list");

                        if (list !== 'undefined' && list.getElementsByClassName('current')) {
                            if (list.getElementsByClassName('current').length)
                                list.getElementsByClassName('current')[0].className = '';

                            //on met la classe current au titre en cours
                            if (list.childNodes[index] != 'undefined') {
                                list.childNodes[index].className = 'current';
                            }
                        }

                        // on change le titre affichée
                        document.getElementById("myEpisodeTitle").innerHTML = playlist[index].title;
                        document.getElementById("myPlaylistButton").setAttribute('data-media-id', playlist[index].mediaid);
                    }
                </script>
            </div>




            <!-- @JeunesseIntegrationReplay/Include/Comments/comments.html.twig -->

            <section class="program_comments" id="main_comment_data" class="commentaires" data-login-url="https://profile.gulli.fr/login"

                itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Comment">
                <h2>

                        <img class="img-responsive" src="//cdn1-gulli.ladmedia.fr/../bundles/jeunesseintegrationreplay/images/main/picto-comments.png"
                            alt="" />
                    </span>
                    Aucun Commentaire </h2>

                <form>
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label class="hidden" for="textAreaComment">&Eacute;crire un commentaire</label>
                        <textarea class="form-control" name="textAreaComment" id="textAreaComment" placeholder="Mon commentaire..." cols="30" rows="1"></textarea>
                        <span class="btn-comment" id="Gulli_comment_submit">Valider</span>
                    </div>
                    <ul class="comments" id="Gulli_comment_list" data-id="Error: Invalid cURL data">
                    </ul>

                </form>
            </section>

                                    alt="Pokémon" />
                            </a>
                        </div>
                    </div>



                    <div class="col-xs-4 col-sm-2 col-md-2">
                        <div class="wrap-img program wrap-zoom">


                            <a href="http://replay.gulli.fr/dessins-animes/Blazing-Team-Les-maitres-du-Yo-Kwon-Do">
                                <img src="http://resize3-gulli.ladmedia.fr/r/340,255,smartcrop,center-top/img/var/storage/imports/replay/images_programme/blazing_team_s1.jpg"
                                    alt="Blazing Team : Les maîtres du Yo Kwon Do" />
                            </a>
                        </div>
                    </div>

        <div class="container">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-md-12">

                        pour visionner vos programmes en différé, sans abonnement.
                    </small>
                </div>

            <script type="text/javascript">
                jQuery.get('/esi/3teasers', function (data) {
                    jQuery('footer .container:first').append(data);
                });
            </script>
            <div class="divider filet"></div>

                jQuery.get('/esi/footer', function (data) {
